firstNightReminder: Show this player any townsfolk token that is in play and any minion token that is in play.
name: Bisexual
ability: Start knowing the existence of a certain minion role and a certain townsfolk role.

firstNightReminder: Show this player any outsider token that is in play and hold up a certain number of fingers depending on how many steps away they are.
name: Gay
ability: You start knowing the existence of a certain outsider role and how many steps away they are from you (or that none are in play).

firstNightReminder: Show this player the current demon token and any other demon token.
name: Multisexual
ability: You are told that the demon is one of two variations when the game begins.

name: Lesbian
ability: Once per game during the day, privately talk to the storyteller. Choose two players: you use your scissoring skills to cut ties between the two players, preventing them from using abilities on each other for the rest of the game.

firstNightReminder: The Aroace points to a player. That player is now holding the shield. If they point to themselves, shake your head no and gesture for them to pick someone else.
otherNightReminder: The current shield holder points to a player. That player is how holding the shield. If they point to themselves, shake your head no and gesture for them to pick someone else.
name: Aroace
ability: Each night* choose a player: they are safe from any debuffs granted by minions or outsiders tonight.

name: Genderfluid
ability: Twice per game, during the day, ask to speak to the storyteller privately. Choose two players: they swap seats.

name: Intolerant
ability: Once per game during the game, publicly choose a player. If that player is a minion, they are executed and lose their vote token.

firstNightReminder: The Non-Binary points to a player. Mark that player with a Disabled token. If a disabled information role attempts to use their ability, inform them that nothing happened.
otherNightReminder: The Non-Binary points to a player. Mark that player with a Disabled token. If a disabled information role attempts to use their ability, inform them that nothing happened.
name: Non-Binary
ability: Each night, choose a player: if they are a minion or an outsider, their ability is disabled until the next night.

firstNightReminder: The gaydar points to two players. They learn if either is a minion.
otherNightReminder: The gaydar points to two players. They learn if either is a minion.
name: Gaydar
ability: Each night, choose two players: you learn if either is a minion.

firstNightReminder: Put up 0-2 fingers based on how many of the two farthest players from them are evil. If there is an even number of players, check how many of the two neighbors of the farthest player is evil.
otherNightReminder: Put up 0-2 fingers based on how many of the two farthest players from them are evil. If there is an even number of players, check how many of the two neighbors of the farthest player is evil.
name: Pansexual
ability: Each night, you learn how many of the two farthest players from you are evil. If there is an even number of people, this affects the neighbors of the farthest person from you.

otherNightReminder: Put up a certain number of fingers corresponding to the number of dead players that are evil.
name: Omnisexual
ability: Each night, you learn how many dead players are evil.

otherNightReminder: Show the Neurosexual any minion token that is not in play.
name: Neurosexual
ability: Each night*, you discover one minion role that is not in play.

otherNightReminder: Every other night (start on the second night), put up a certain number of fingers corresponding to how many player's abilities worked incorrectly last night. Show the Agender a character token or reminder token that explains why.
name: Agender
ability: Every other night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked incorrectly last night and why.

name: Straight Shooter
ability: When you find out that you died, choose a player: If they are the demon, they die.

firstNightReminder: Show the Polysexual three players, at least two of which are of the same alignment. The third player can be of the same alignment or of a different alignment.
otherNightReminder: If you choose to, tell the polysexual one player in that group and one other player in that group that has the same alingment.
name: Polysexual
ability: You start knowing that at least two of three certain players are of the same alignment. You might be told who is of the same alignment later on.

firstNightReminder: The bottom points to a player. Mark that player with the Top reminder token.
otherNightReminder: The bottom points to a player. Mark that player with the Top reminder token.
name: Bottom
ability: Each night, choose a player: That player is your top until the next night. If that player dies the next day, you die as well.

name: Closeted
ability: If you are ever “mad” about being the closeted, you lose your ability to vote normally and are instead given one vote token.

name: Ally
ability: While you are alive, your alive neighbors might register as good and as a townsfolk or outsider.

name: Beard
ability: Any and all abilities that would normally target the demon will instead target you. You might register as evil and as a minion or a demon. This effect lasts until you die.

name: Politician
ability: Once per game during the day, ask to privately speak to the storyteller. choose a player. From now on, they might register as evil and as a minion or a demon.

firstNightReminder: The Homophobic Dad points to a player. Mark that player with the Son reminder token.
otherNightReminder: The Homophobic Dad points to a player. That player dies.
name: Homophobic Dad
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On the first night, choose a player: They are now your son. If they are ever “mad” about their role or the fact that they are the son, they lose their ability to vote and gain a vote token.
